properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 11:48AM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Transitioned to a Lake Wind Advisory just for Lake
Tahoe.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph.
Waves 2 to 4 feet. Highest waves along east and northeast
shores.

* WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON FOR LAKE TAHOE... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
